summary: Arrowsmith allows you to craft arrows in bundles of 50.
descriptionHtml:
Localized versions available:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1438]French[/url], [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1761]German[/url], [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1884]Italian[/url], [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1771]Spanish[/url]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I am NOT the author of this mod. I am uploading this with permission of the original author. There will be no support, but I will try to maintain the latest version for the nexus community.

All thanks shall go to Samutz for this great mod. Check the credits on how to contact him.

If you want to creat your own recipes, check out his tutorial on the official forum:
[url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1286593-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck]http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1286593-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck[/url]

Original mod description below:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/*************
* CHANGE LOG *
*************/
v3
- Menus fixed. For example, Orcish Arrows now appear in the Orcish section of the smithing menu.
- Added recipe for Ancient Nord Bow.
- Feathers re-worked. Arrows now require a Bundle of Fletchings, which can be made at the tanning rack using 3 Hawk Feathers, 3 Hagraven Feathers, or 3 Quills.
 
v2a
- Fixed formIDs (hopefully) that might have caused random bugs.

v2
- All recipes requirements re-balanced. Most now require hawk feathers and make 50 arrows.
- Added Ancient Nord Arrow recipe.

v1
- Initial Release

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- RECIPES -

Iron Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 5 Iron Ingot
 - No special requirements. Craftable from the start.

Steel Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 2 Iron Ingot, 2 Steel Ingot
 - Requires Steel Smithing perk.

Ancient Nord Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 2 Iron Ingot, 2 Steel Ingot
 - Requires Skyforge crafting unlocked.
 - Can only be crafted at the Skyforge.

Orcish Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 1 Orichalcum Ingot, 1 Iron Ingot, 1 Steel Ingot, 1 Bundle of Fletchings
 - Requires Orcish Smithing perk.

Dwarven Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 1 Dwarven Metal Ingot, 1 Iron Ingot, 1 Steel Ingot, 1 Bundle of Fletchings
 - Requires Dwarven Smithing perk.

Elven Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 1 Refined Moonstone, 1 Quicksilver Ingot, 1 Bundle of Fletchings
 - Requires Elven Smithing perk.

Glass Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 1 Refined Moonstone, 1 Refined Malachite, 1 Bundle of Fletchings
 - Requires Glass Smithing perk.

Ebony Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 1 Ebony Ingot, 1 Bundle of Fletchings
 - Requires Ebony Smithing perk.

Nord Hero Arrow (50): 5 Firewood, 50 Ancient Nord Arrow, 50 Steel Ingot, 25 Iron Ingot, 1 Bundle of Fletchings
 - Requires Skyforge crafting unlocked.
 - Can only be crafted at the Skyforge.

Daedric Arrow (100): 10 Firewood, 2 Ebony Ingot, 1 Daedra Heart, 2 Bundle of Fletchings
 - Requires Daedric Smithing perk.

- TRANSLATOR NOTES -
 - Only the FULL subrecord on WEAP, AMMO, and MISC needs to be translated.
author: Samutz
